sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnadbk ( EMPLYR_ID /* */ , NCRD_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , ADBK_CONSTNT_ID /* */ , NM /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MBTLNUM /* */ , FXNUM /* */ , OFFM_TELNO /* */ , HOUSE_TELNO /* */ , ADBK_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #emplyrId# /* */ , #ncrdId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #adbkConstntId# /* */ , #nm# /* */ , #emailAdres# /* */ , #mbtlnum# /* */ , #fxnum# /* */ , #offmTelno# /* */ , #houseTelno# /* */ , #adbkId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnadbk SET EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */ , NCRD_ID=#ncrdId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , ADBK_CONSTNT_ID=#adbkConstntId# /* */ , NM=#nm# /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES=#emailAdres# /* */ , MBTLNUM=#mbtlnum# /* */ , FXNUM=#fxnum# /* */ , OFFM_TELNO=#offmTelno# /* */ , HOUSE_TELNO=#houseTelno# /* */ , ADBK_ID=#adbkId# /* */ WHERE ADBK_CONSTNT_ID=#adbkConstntId# /* */ AND ADBK_ID=#adbkId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnadbk WHERE ADBK_CONSTNT_ID=#adbkConstntId# /* */ AND ADBK_ID=#adbkId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT EMPLYR_ID /* */ , NCRD_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , ADBK_CONSTNT_ID /* */ , NM /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MBTLNUM /* */ , FXNUM /* */ , OFFM_TELNO /* */ , HOUSE_TELNO /* */ , ADBK_ID /* */ FROM comtnadbk WHERE ADBK_CONSTNT_ID=#adbkConstntId# /* */ AND ADBK_ID=#adbkId# /* */

SELECT EMPLYR_ID /* */ , NCRD_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , ADBK_CONSTNT_ID /* */ , NM /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MBTLNUM /* */ , FXNUM /* */ , OFFM_TELNO /* */ , HOUSE_TELNO /* */ , ADBK_ID /* */ FROM comtnadbk WHERE 1=1
EMPLYR_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
NCRD_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY ADBK_CONSTNT_ID DESC /* */ , ADBK_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnadbk WHERE 1=1
EMPLYR_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
NCRD_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
